context: Is the Wii U backwards compatible with Gamecube Games and the Wavebird Wireless Gamecube controller?

context: how many players is this game
response: One player, or two-player co-operative. No online multiplayer.

context: Does it come with a redeemable code that I need, or need to play online?
response: You pay for a code redeem to download the game from playstore. After that you can play campaign and play on line if you are a psn plus user.

context: Which expansion packs does it include ? Does it have Apartment life ?
response: This isn't sims 2 this is the first sims game that includes all the expansion packs for it. No it does not include a apartment life pack.

context: Will this make me have to remap my emulator's input options because the controller uses joystick buttons, or does it activate keys on the keyboard?
response: I believe you will have to remap your emulator's input options when you switch between controllers, though the D pad's input options might translate to the joystick's input options.  As far as I can tell, it does not activate keys on the keyboard.

context: Does this game support the use of the wii u pro controller instead of the gamepad?
response: Yes, especially necessary with multiplayer mode.

context: will this game work with windows 7
response: Yes, this works very well on my Windows 7.

context: Can you hook up two of the controllers for co-op games like contra?
response: I had problems with getting two controllers to work as separate units; I solved it with the FCEUX version 2.2.2 for the PC - that release allows you to setup two controllers as different controllers. If you're using a different platform, try the latest release of the emulator you're using.

context: I have my ps3 registered  for  CHile (latinamerica)and I am not pretty sure if I can still use this , I am living in costarica,
response: Don't buy. Try somewhere else. My worst Amazon purchase ever. Plus I'm $50 out of pocket. DON'T BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!

context: Will this work on windows XP?
response: Yes it should. With the force feedback you will need the drivers on the disks to control how powerful it will be. You may have to find the software online.

context: Does it have 2 player mode, i mean can 2 players play with two controllers at the same time, on same ps4 (i dont mean online)
response: yes it does have two player mode..two controllers

context: will it download in Window 7?
response: don"t buy any down loads from this site amazon  no custermer service on it

context: Does this G700s work on glass? I have the Logitech MX performance, and want more macro keys.
response: Hmm, I didn't try this until I saw this question.  Mine works ok on my glass desk if the desk is slightly dirty from normal use, but after cleaning the desk with Windex the mouse no longer tracks.

context: Why it is only 29$?
response: It's a used copy of game

context: does it have a senario maker or make your own map
response: Not within the game itself.

context: Does this game have multiplayer mode
response: In free play, yes. Otherwise multiplayer online requires 2 systems and 2 games.

context: can you play this game solo?
response: Indeed you can play solo. It allows multi-player which I haven't done yet.

context: Does this game require an HD TV?
response: No, doesn't require an HD TV.  The graphics are really good even without an HD.

context: Will this run on Windows 8.1?
response: Yes it will.  I'm playing on my laptop.

context: Hello, this instrument supports P3D V2 it? Buy.
response: I only know it supports FSX, and then that's is questionable. I bought 3 if them based on reviews from other post. Personally I would not recommend them to any one.

context: These memberships works for just one account? Or multiple accounts in the same console? Thanks
response: It works just for one account...

context: Is this the original game, but ported to DS?
response: Yes........same great SNES game with updated graphics.

context: do the keys fade? I have bought several keyboards where the keys scratch easily and the letters fade off revealing a white plastic underneath.
response: They haven't started to fade at all.

context: can you buy games for children to play with this
response: I do not know. My 8 year old nephew would use the wheel to play my husband's Formula 1 racing game. But we didn't have any children's games to try it with.

context: Does this connect with USB?
response: Yes, it works with everything, even X-plane, but you will need to download software from their website to make it compatible.

context: [Solved] Does the Orbweaver store the active profile on the device like the n52te does? Does it have only the dpad for the thumb buttons?
response: Nope not stored on the device. U can always check the razed webcite. And as far as thumb buttons there is the d pad which has 8 buttons on it, the space bar like button below it and a small button above it

context: How is the pvp combat system compared to Dark Souls? I was obsessed with Dark Souls but Dark Souls 2 looks a bit sluggish and unresponsive.
response: from what i can tell it is smoother but i thought the pvp in dark souls was smooth. it really depends on the internet you have cuz not all internet connections are the same

context: i know this is a 2 game pack but when i had final fantasy x2 it had a music video intro which i liked a lot does the hd version of x-2 also have that
response: The Real Emotion? Yes it does

context: Please, is this game translated to spanish?
response: No, it is not , only english and french

context: what controller is best to play this game on PC?
response: I use my wireless 360 controller and I am very pleased with it. Also it is compatible with most of the games out there so it is an option to consider if you don't have a controller yet.

context: will these work with a pc
response: Yes they will they work for all brands except xbox one as far as I know.

context: Is the scroll wheel free-spinning, has click stops, or switchable (like the MX Revolution)?
response: The scroll will is click stop but very smooth , new experience from logitech. You can't control it like the MX

context: How do you turn it on after unplugging the usb?
response: You should be able to push the "analog" button to turn it on, but it must have a charge. Personally I can't get it to work with any of my games. Should have spent the extra money on a 360 controller :/

context: Wondering how you play this game on a desktop PC?  Do you use a wireless controller or a keyboard and mouse?  Which controller setup is best?
response: I mostly use a Xbox wired controller. But that's just me.

context: what controller is best to play this game on PC?
response: I'm using an Xbox 360 controller and it works perfectly, no hassle. Just plug in and that's it.
